com.samsung.android.sdk.cup

Class ScupSeparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupWidgetBase
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupSeparator

  • public class ScupSeparator
extends ScupWidgetBase
    This class represents a separator.
    If user insert this widget, next inserted widget have to display at left of the new line.
    And if you want, it can display the line.
    This is a kind of extended widget. If a device can not support this widget, a device can display nothing. But line feed property is working.

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys a ScupSeparator instance.
        If the Separator is shown on the screen, Separator will be hidden automatically.
        Overrides:
        destroy in class ScupWidgetBase
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If widget is already destroyed.

      • setLineThickness

        public void setLineThickness(float thickness)
        Sets the thickness of line.
        If the thickness of line is greater than 0, a line will be drawn in the Separator.
        Parameters:
        thickness - the thickness of line in points
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If thickness is negative.

      • getLineThickness

        public float getLineThickness()
        Gets the thickness of line.
        Returns:
        The thickness of line in points.

      • setLineColor

        public void setLineColor(int color)
        Sets the color of line.
        Only if the thickness is greater than 0, the line will be drawn.
        Parameters:
        color - the color of line
        See Also:
        setLineThickness(float)

      • getLineColor

        Gets the color of line.
